title: fourDNData
text: 4D Nucleome Data Coordination Integration Center (DCIC) developed actively maintains data portal providing public access wealth resources investigate 3D chromatin architecture. Notably, 3D chromatin conformation libraries relying different technologies (“situ” “dilution” Hi-C, Capture Hi-C, Micro-C, DNase Hi-C, …), generated 50+ collaborating labs, homogenously processed, yielding 350 sets processed files. fourDNData (read 4DN-Data) package giving programmatic access uniformly processed Hi-C contact files. fourDNData() function provides gateway 4DN-hosted Hi-C files, including contact matrices (.hic .mcool) Hi-C derived files annotated compartments, domains, insulation scores, .pairs files.
code: library(fourDNData) head(fourDNData()) #>   experimentSetAccession     fileType     size organism experimentType details #> 1           4DNES18BMU79        pairs 10151.53    mouse   in situ Hi-C   DpnII #> 3           4DNES18BMU79          hic  5285.82    mouse   in situ Hi-C   DpnII #> 4           4DNES18BMU79        mcool  6110.75    mouse   in situ Hi-C   DpnII #> 5           4DNES18BMU79   boundaries     0.12    mouse   in situ Hi-C   DpnII #> 6           4DNES18BMU79   insulation     7.18    mouse   in situ Hi-C   DpnII #> 7           4DNES18BMU79 compartments     0.18    mouse   in situ Hi-C   DpnII #>                                dataset #> 1 Hi-C on Mouse Olfactory System cells #> 3 Hi-C on Mouse Olfactory System cells #> 4 Hi-C on Mouse Olfactory System cells #> 5 Hi-C on Mouse Olfactory System cells #> 6 Hi-C on Mouse Olfactory System cells #> 7 Hi-C on Mouse Olfactory System cells #>                                                         condition #> 1 Mature olfactory sensory neurons with conditional Ldb1 knockout #> 3 Mature olfactory sensory neurons with conditional Ldb1 knockout #> 4 Mature olfactory sensory neurons with conditional Ldb1 knockout #> 5 Mature olfactory sensory neurons with conditional Ldb1 knockout #> 6 Mature olfactory sensory neurons with conditional Ldb1 knockout #> 7 Mature olfactory sensory neurons with conditional Ldb1 knockout #>                 biosource biosourceType             publication #> 1 olfactory receptor cell  primary cell Monahan K et al. (2019) #> 3 olfactory receptor cell  primary cell Monahan K et al. (2019) #> 4 olfactory receptor cell  primary cell Monahan K et al. title: fourDNData
text: HiCExperiment package can used import .mcool files provided fourDNData. Refer HiCExperiment package documentation information. Rather importing multiple files corresponding single experimentSet accession ID one one, one can import available files associated experimentSet accession ID HiCExperiment object using fourDNHiCExperiment() function.
code: library(HiCExperiment) ID <- '4DNESDP9ECMN' cf <- CoolFile(     path = fourDNData(ID, type = 'mcool'),      metadata = as.list(fourDNData()[fourDNData()$experimentSetAccession == ID,]) ) x <- import(cf, resolution = 250000, focus = 'chr5:10000000-50000000') x #> `HiCExperiment` object with 7,466 contacts over 161 regions  #> ------- #> fileName: "/github/home/.cache/R/fourDNData/234e1505c11f_4DNFI4988896.mcool"  #> focus: "chr5:10,000,000-50,000,000"  #> resolutions(13): 1000 2000 ... 5000000 10000000 #> active resolution: 250000  #> interactions: 2158  #> scores(2): count balanced  #> topologicalFeatures: compartments(0) borders(0) loops(0) viewpoints(0)  #> pairsFile: N/A  #> metadata(12): experimentSetAccession fileType ... publication URL interactions(x) #> GInteractions object with 2158 interactions and 4 metadata columns: #>          seqnames1           ranges1     seqnames2           ranges2 | #>              <Rle>         <IRanges>         <Rle>         <IRanges> | #>      [1]      chr5 10000001-10250000 ---      chr5 10000001-10250000 | #>      [2]      chr5 10000001-10250000 ---      chr5 10250001-10500000 | #>      [3]      chr5 10000001-10250000 ---      chr5 10500001-10750000 | #>      [4]      chr5 10000001-10250000 ---      chr5 10750001-11000000 | #>      [5]      chr5 10000001-10250000 ---      chr5 11250001-11500000 | #>      ...       ...               ... ...       ...               ... . #>   [2154]      chr5 46000001-46250000 ---      chr5 46250001-46500000 | #>   [2155]      chr5 46250001-46500000 ---      chr5 46250001-46500000 | #>   [2156]      chr5 46250001-46500000 ---      chr5 47000001-47250000 | #>   [2157]      chr5 49500001-49750000 ---      chr5 49500001-49750000 | #>   [2158]      chr5 49750001-50000000 ---      chr5 49750001-50000000 | #>            bin_id1   bin_id2     count  balanced #>          <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> #>      [1]      3560 [2156]      3705      3708         1       NaN #>   [2157]      3718      3718        11  0.320998 #>   [2158]      3719      3719         1       NaN #>   ------- #>   regions: 161 ranges and 4 metadata columns #>   seqinfo: 24 sequences from an unspecified genome as(x, 'ContactMatrix') #> class: ContactMatrix  #> dim: 161 161  #> type: dgCMatrix  #> rownames: NULL #> colnames: NULL #> metadata(0): #> regions: 161 library(HiCExperiment) x <- fourDNHiCExperiment('4DNESDP9ECMN') #> Fetching local Hi-C contact map from Bioc cache #> Fetching local compartments bigwig file from Bioc cache #> Insulation not found for the provided experimentSet accession. #> Borders not found for the provided experimentSet accession. #> Importing contacts in memory

title: Authors and Citation
text: Serizay J (2023). fourDNData: 4DN data package. R package version 0.99.3, https://github.com/js2264/fourDNData.
code: @Manual{,   title = {fourDNData: 4DN data package},   author = {Jacques Serizay},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.99.3},   url = {https://github.com/js2264/fourDNData}, }

title: 4DN data package
text: fourDNData (read 4DN-Data) data package giving programmatic access Hi-C contact files uniformly processed 4DN consortium. fourDNData() function provides gateway 4DN-hosted Hi-C files, including contact matrices (.hic .mcool) Hi-C derived files annotated compartments, domains, insulation scores, pairs files. fourDNHiCExperiment() function recovers 4DN-hosted Hi-C files associated single experimentSet Accession number.

title: 4DN data package
text: fourDNData integrated within HiCExperiment ecosystem Bioconductor. Read HiCExperiment class handling Hi-C data R .  HiCExperiment: Parsing Hi-C files R HiCool: End--end integrated workflow process fastq files .cool .pairs files HiContacts: Investigating Hi-C results R HiContactsData: Data companion package fourDNData: Gateway package 4DN-hosted Hi-C experiments

title: fourDNData — fourDNData
text: Fetches files 4DN data portal caches using BiocFileCache system.

title: fourDNData — fourDNData
text: experimentSetAccession 4DN-provided experimentSet Accession number (check https://data.4dnucleome.org/browse/) browser-based explorer. type c('pairs', 'hic', 'mcool', 'boundaries', 'insulation', 'compartments') .fetch_pairs Whether also download associated pairs file

title: fourDNData — fourDNData
text: fourDNData() returns local path queried file cached BiocFileCache. fourDNHiCExperiment() returns HiCExperiment object populated metadata topologicalFeatures ( available).

title: fourDNData — fourDNData

what: Manage cache / download files from the 4DN data portal — fourDNDataCache
title: Manage cache / download files from the 4DN data portal — fourDNDataCache
text: Managing 4DN data downloads via integrated BiocFileCache system.

title: Manage cache / download files from the 4DN data portal — fourDNDataCache

code: bfc <- fourDNDataCache() bfc #> class: BiocFileCache #> bfccache: /github/home/.cache/R/fourDNData #> bfccount: 4 #> For more information see: bfcinfo() or bfcquery() BiocFileCache::bfcinfo(bfc) #> # A tibble: 4 × 10 #>   rid   rname            creat…¹ acces…² rpath rtype fpath last_…³ etag  expires #>   <chr> <chr>            <chr>   <chr>   <chr> <chr> <chr> <chr>   <chr>   <dbl> #> 1 BFC1  4DNFI4988896.mc… 2023-0… 2023-0… /git… web   http… 2021-0… 1976…      NA #> 2 BFC2  4DNFIDO8B3C6.bw  2023-0… 2023-0… /git… web   http… 2021-0… c65b…      NA #> 3 BFC3  4DNFIN8OYCB3.mc… 2023-0… 2023-0… /git… web   http… 2021-0… 4c12…      NA #> 4 BFC4  4DNFICY2KUGU.bw  2023-0… 2023-0… /git… web   http… 2021-0… a074…      NA #> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​create_time, ²​access_time, #> #   ³​last_modified_time
